EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining Pivotal at Geode Summit!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://geodesummit.com/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apache-geode-q116]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining us for the inaugural Geode Summit! We hope you enjoyed learning how Geode contributes to many innovative software patterns and mission critical systems. We invite you to review Four Real World Uses For An In-Memory Data Grid <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/case-studies/four-real-world-use-cases-for-an-in-memory-data-grid?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium-text-link&utm_campaign=GeodeSummitQ116]]> on Pivotal’s P.O.V. blog, referenced by Eitan Suez in his talk on Geode’s place in modern system architectures.
Hone your technical expertise with Pivotal Academy’s <[[http://pivotal.io/academy?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium-text-link&utm_campaign=GeodeSummitQ116]]> extensive portfolio of role-based training courses, including GemFire Administration and Development. And start getting involved in the Apache Geode community by joining a Geode community mailing list <[[http://geode.incubator.apache.org/community/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium-text-link&utm_campaign=GeodeSummitQ116]]>.
Want more? Participate in a live discussion at Pivotal’s SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=GeodeSummitQ116]]>, August 1–4 in Las Vegas. SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating data-driven software services.
Whether you are just starting your digital transformation journey or already delivering at scale, there will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data analytics, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops, and more.
Let’s build something meaningful.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
